headline: Team Building Coach | Emcee | Radio Jockey | Ex Red FM | Ex Radio City
shortBio: New York Radio Forum Awards nominee & RJ with 10+ years of experience hosting corporate events, college fests, and community programs. I design high-energy, structured team-building experiences that blend fun, trust, and learning.

children.text: RJ Prabhu is a team building coach, emcee, and seasoned radio jockey with over a decade of on-air and on-stage experience. From Red FM and Radio City studios to corporate offsites and college festivals, he has built a career around connection, spontaneity, and energy.

Through Bhandarmath Media Works, Prabhu curates tailor-made employee engagement programs, ice-breaker sessions, and problem-solving games that help teams open up, collaborate, and remember the experience long after the event.
Whether itâ€™s a leadership offsite, a college cultural fest, or a community gathering, his sessions are designed to keep energy high, participation inclusive, and learning subtle yet powerful.
